name: Perspectives (maaaaaaaaaani)
description:
Hi everyone this is my entry for the third Blackthornprod game jam.

The theme was "Less is more", and I went for a simple 2D platformer where you only need to jump over some spikes and get to the end flag with only one level(The less part), but each time you touch the flag you will be sent back to the beginning and you will have to beat the level again but with another perspective(The more part).

So to make it short the idea of this game is less gameplay and levels and more "Perspectives".

I am really happy how it turned out and I can't wait to check out your entries for this game jam.
